title: High Elf
content:
igid beam of blue-white light. Deals 1d8 Cold and reduce the target's speed by 3m. Shocking Grasp: Lightning springs from your hand. Deals 1d8 Lightning and prevents the target from taking reactions. True Strike: Divine a character's defences to give you advantage on attack rolls against it.

Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12m. Keen Senses: Proficiency in Perception. Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic canâ€™t put them to sleep. Elven Weapon Training: Profi
